div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 11:35 am CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Windy, with a north northwest wind 25 to 30 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. Breezy, with a north wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 76. West wind 5 to 10 mph becoming south in the afternoon.
